data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Tabanus trivittatus species-group (Diptera: Tabanidae), with description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carmo, Daniel D. D., Henriques, Augusto L. (2019): Taxonomy of Tabanus trivittatus species-group (Diptera: Tabanidae), with description of five new species. Zootaxa 4554 (1): 63-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4554.1.2
